content.text: Step 3: Submit a new version & make your app free

inlineContent.text: Once everything is ready and tested, submit your app to the App Store and set it to ‚ÄúManually release this version‚Äù. Once your update is approved, release your version and immediately after that set your app pricing to ‚ÄúFree‚Äù. This will ensure that no one can download your previous (paid) version for free but also no one has to pay for the new Freemium version. The order is important here.
